alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 21 at 2:28PM CST until December 24 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 7 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected, in the single digits and teens for most locations Thursday night and Friday night and only in the teens and 20s during the day on Friday. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Alabama and southeast Mississippi. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to 7 AM CST Saturday. However, the Advisory will likely be extended southward and continue through most of the weekend as well. * IMPACTS...Extremely low wind chill temperatures can increase the likelihood of adverse cold weather effects on the body such as frostbite and hyperthermia.
info.instruction: Remain indoors in a warm area if possible, with only short times outdoors. If you must go outside, several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat.A hat is also important as half your body heat loss can be from the head.
